name: expansiveness
content:
expansiveness noun [U]
(TALK)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of talking happily to people in a friendly way: In contrast to her expansiveness, he tends to be quiet and insular. He has a tendency towards expansiveness and poetry.
More examplesFewer examplesThe actor fully embodies the character's paradoxes, his selfishness, his expansiveness, and his love of life.I like his expansiveness when he's excited.He was praised for the expansiveness of his approach in tackling his topics.

expansiveness noun [U]
(LARGE)
the fact that something covers a large area: When it came time to choose a place to live, I wanted expansiveness so that I didn't feel constricted. The expansiveness of the room energizes the students.
